official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to authorize the United States Postal Service to furnish certain lists of addresses to the Bureau of the Census.

summary.text: Permits the United States Postal Service to furnish to the Secretary of Commerce any list of addresses that the Secretary considers appropriate to carry out a census or survey. Applies provisions relating to the confidential treatment of information to any such list.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to authorize the United States Postal Service to furnish certain lists of addresses to the Bureau of the Census.
